name: automation-dashboard
description: File cleanup automation dashboard with real-time progress tracking

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q build 2>nul || true && cd ../backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || true && cd ../frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || true
